Unlocker by ShadeSpyker

Replace the options file here:

In XP :
C:\Documents and Settings\(User Name)\Application Data\Ubisoft\Assassin's Creed Brotherhood\Saves


Win 7:
C:\Users\(User Name)\Saved Games\Assassin's Creed Brotherhood\Saves

BESURE TO MAKE A BACKUP OF THE ORIGINAL "OPTIONS" FILE, JUST IN CASE!

Save Game that is included has 100% everything completed and is optional you do not have to use it.
once you copy the file you get mission icons on your map

Here are the steps that I did to make it work since it never worked for the first time as well.

1. Download this torrent. (of course)
2. Install Patch 1.01 (do not change the default folders set to where this patch will be installed)
3. Copy the contents of the CRACK Folder to your Assassin's Creed Brotherhood game folder.
4. In the DLC Unlocker Folder, do not copy the ACBROTHERHOODSAVEGAME1.SAV, instead, just copy the OPTIONS file and paste it in:

In XP :
 C:\Documents and Settings\(User Name)\Application Data\Ubisoft\Assassin's Creed Brotherhood\Saves

Win 7:
 C:\Users\(User Name)\Saved Games\Assassin's Creed Brotherhood\Saves

5. Play the game.

The reason why it never worked for the first time is because I copied ACBROTHERHOODSAVEGAME1.SAV from DLC Unlocker folder.after I restored my original saved files and just copied OPTIONS from DLC Unlocker folder,it then worked.I dont know why and what's the difference between my saved game file and this saved game file but it fixed the problem.hope this helps.
